#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t1,t2;
    cin >> t1 >>t2;
    while(t1!=0l&&t2!=0l)
    {
       long long int a=1l,b=2l,c,count=0;
        while(1)
        {
            c=a+b;
            a=b;
            b=c;
            if(c>=t1&&c<=t2)
                count++;
            if(c>=t2)
                break;
        }
        cout << count << endl;
        cin >> t1 >> t2;
    }
    return 0;
}
